for tc in range(int(input())):
    (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
    lr = l % 3
    if lr:
        lr = 3 - lr
    rr = r % 3
    nl = l + lr
    nr = r - rr
    print((nr - nl) // 3 + 1)

def find_count(start, end):
    reminder = start % 3
    start += 3 - reminder if reminder != 0 else 0
    end -= end % 3
    counter = (end - start) // 3 + 1
    return counter
number_of_test_cases = int(input())
for i in range(number_of_test_cases):
    inputs = input().split()
    start = int(inputs[0])
    end = int(inputs[1])
    print(find_count(start, end))

def find_count(start, end):
    reminder = start % 3
    start += 3 - reminder if reminder != 0 else 0
    end -= end % 3
    counter = (end - start) // 3 + 1
    return counter
number_of_test_cases = int(input())
for i in range(number_of_test_cases):
    inputs = input().split()
    start = int(inputs[0])
    end = int(inputs[1])
    print(find_count(start, end))

from math import ceil
for i in range(int(input())):
    (a, b) = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    start = str(a)
    cnt = 0
    sm = 0
    for j in range(len(start)):
        sm += int(start[j])
    rem1 = sm % 3
    cnt = 0
    sm = 0
    start = str(b)
    for j in range(len(start)):
        sm += int(start[j])
    rem2 = sm % 3
    print((b - a + 1 - rem1 - rem2) // 3 + 1)

ans = ''
for _ in range(int(input())):
    (l, r) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    i = l
    while i % 3 != 0:
        i += 1
    num = (r - i) // 3 + 1
    ans += str(num) + '\n'
print(ans)

    return r // 3 - (l - 1) // 3

t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    t -= 1
    (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
    ct = 0
    x11 = x % 3
    if x11 == 0:
        x11 = 3
    x1 = 3 - x11 + x
    y1 = y - y % 3
    n = (y1 - x1) // 3
    print(n + 1)

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (L, R) = map(int, input().split())
    if L % 3 == 0:
        lower = L
    else:
        lower = L + (3 - L % 3)
    upper = R - R % 3
    x = upper // 3
    y = lower // 3
    print(x - y + 1)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    if a % 3 == 0:
        a -= 3
    a += 3 - a % 3
    b += 3 - b % 3
    print((b - a) // 3)
